subject: College Athletics
Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
organizations: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
lead_paragraph: Down by 10 with less than five minutes to play, the fifth-seeded Hokies dug in on defense and held Illinois scoreless for the last four minutes 29 seconds to advance to the second round.
snippet: Down by 10 with less than five minutes to play, the fifth-seeded Hokies dug in on defense and held Illinois scoreless for the last four minutes 29 seconds to advance to the second round.
